content: Don’t pretend you don’t know who I’m talking about. There’s always one. The kid who interrupts the professor to correct them in front of hundreds of other students. The kid who asks questions about content WAY beyond the scope of class, that have NOTHING to do with anything, but the professor is then forced to answer because we are all now held captive by this idiot’s need to impress upon us how smart he is. I could pretend to use he/she but we all know we’ve never met one who didn’t identify as a “he”.
